DOC.brief_title: Sleep Quality Presence Sleep Disordered Breathing
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study survey quality sleep sleep disorder breathe HIV infected inner city ambulatory African-American Population age 50 year old . A secondary objective investigate possible relationship sleep quality aspect patient 's medical history include BMI , CD4 count , HIV viral load , history substance abuse , psychiatric disorder , concurrent medical condition , current HIV medication HIV medication compliance . Hypothesis : African-American HIV infected individual age 50 year old high prevalence sleep disorder low quality sleep .
